Articles.Content:
Hi there! I started KSP shortly before 0.9 and saw a bunch of changes till now. I love to play KSP, but since 1.0.3 all of my Probes explode during ascent. There is a heat warning, even if i put it inside fairings. Usually at a height of 46-50km the engine starts to "spitting" (?) an finally all what went up is breaking apart.....

I am rather helpless now.

Has someone expirienced similiar things or even has a helpful hint? ![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)

Actually it is like "Gravity" - all my communication satellites (RemoteTech) are lost. I don't like the new thermodynamic. All I have put in space will probably collapse due to overheating of - listen - girder segments. My Space Station lost all of it's solar panels and is now without energy, which is a problem because I am using TACLS, too. I don't like the idea of restarting from the beginning, so I am going to quit. Or not.

Message to Squad: Will there be Thermal Insulation Shields like used on Skylab? Make them KAS/KIS working so I probably can rescue at least my Space Station.

And make more IVA interiors!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-28T12:31:07Z" title="06/28/2015 12:31  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 28, 2015</time> by Tranquil**

> 
> Usually at a height of 46-50km the engine starts to "spitting" (?) an finally all what went up is breaking apart.....
> I am rather helpless now.
> 
> Has someone expirienced similiar things or even has a helpful hint? ![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)

I'm not really sure what you mean by "spitting". Like, flameouts, asymmetric thrust, gimbal problems?

I've never really had a similar experience to this. All my launches usually go unscathed...

In any case, here's the plate of cookies.

Thanks for your reply! 

I think it's some kind of flameouts, rather unsure because at that moment the probe atop of the rocket usually begins to desintegrate.... often the engines will continue working and complete the destruction of the probe, while rushing through the remains of the probe!

Nonetheless I decided to start all over again. Maybe I will try to circumnavigate Kerbin?

> 
> Maybe I will try to circumnavigate Kerbin?

You've piqued my interest. Please do continue...
